name: Youtube Custom Color++
description: Hey! 👋🏽 This style is same thing as RainbowTube++ but without the rainbow transition effect. Still comes with the same customizable settings and still works well with both Flattube and CleanTube. TL;DR Just a minor alteration on the original 😁 Made with 💖 by Justin Ikeako.
additional_info: MILESTONE • Woah... thank you guys for 10k :D 🎉🎉🎉 VERSION 1.5.1 • Restored the show/hide repl(y/ies) button for light mode. VERSION 1.5.0 • The like/dislike animations were reworked to have more personality. VERSION 1.4.1 • Fixed some color irregularities. VERSION 1.4.0 • Added theming to the scrollbar 🎉 VERSION 1.3.2 • Added the unread notification dot to the list of affected elements. • Heart outline now adapts to theming. VERSION 1.3.1 • Fixed the bad contrast of the "subscribe" button. VERSION 1.3.0 • Added theming to the "SET REMINDER" button. • Fixed an issue where the youtube logo doesn't inherit the custom theme color (not in chrome). VERSION 1.2.1 • Minor fix for the new Flattube update. VERSION 1.2.0 • Added optional watch overlay. VERSION 1.1.0 • Added like/dislike animation. • Subscribe button now has a darker version of the custom color. • Other minor improvements. VERSION 1.0.0 • Initial release 🎉🎉
